about_the_game:
Missing Pieces is a story-driven adventure in a vibrant alien world, full of hidden secrets, a plethora of languages and a sparkling cast of characters: lovable rogues, heartbroken families, and questionable allies. Find friendship and love, learn about yourself and discover who you really are!

A brilliant scientist travels to an alien planet in a galaxy far away. What initially begins as a journey for a better life quickly turns into a nightmare of challenges. Stranded on an unfamiliar planet, lost and misunderstood, you yearn to return home. If only your capsule hadn’t crashed when it arrived …

The compelling narrative is interwoven with puzzles rooted in the alien cultures around you: deciphering cryptic alien languages, harnessing the power of alien artifacts, both ancient and new, and learning to play the instrument of beings with no discernible mouths or limbs.

If only you had all the missing pieces to fix your capsule, you could finally be on your way home. But will that be your fulfillment?

The compelling narrative is interwoven with puzzles rooted in the alien cultures around you: deciphering cryptic alien languages, harnessing the power of alien artifacts, both ancient and new, and learning to play the instrument of beings with no discernible mouths or limbs.

name: Missing Pieces

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel I5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris/AMD Vega8 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel I5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete GPU / Nvidi1050 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Missing Pieces is a story-driven adventure in a vibrant alien world, full of hidden secrets, a plethora of languages and a sparkling cast of characters: lovable rogues, heartbroken families, and questionable allies. Find friendship and love, learn about yourself and discover who you really are!
